title: Is the reward for praying in Masjid Al Haram only for fard prayers or also voluntary prayers
transcript: my question is praying in majid al-haram brings hundred thousand rewards but is this reward for obligatory prayer or any volunteer prayer it is for all acify any prayer you pray in the masjid al-haram it is multiply it's better than a hundred thousand elsewhere whether it's a fart or it's a sunnah or it's your witter or it's your night prayer it's all the same in the reward and allah knows best you
